sentence: Staff was very personable and hotel was very clean and relaxing during business trips
Staying in the hotel with a group prior to a cruise the next day and this hotel has complimentary drinks and snacks nightly
Our group stayed before our cruise
Stayed at this hotel recently for a mini stay cation
We chose Embassy Suites as a treat for my family to stay in downtown tampa and tour the city and beaches
Great trip nice weather the Bay area is awesome view from your room
it is a great getaway for couples and families
Our room was a good size for our family of 5 with 2 double beds and a fold out sofa plus kitchenette and living area
Our family stayed for the weekend and had an Awesome time
Had stayed here previously years before and loved it so much I wanted to come back and bring the whole family
Our check in started with putting my family of four in a room with a king bed when we had reserved 2 queens
Embassy suites is a must during my vacation
not the best trip but Hilton helped me salvage it
The noise really lowered my evaluation of an otherwise nice trip to Tampa
The first floor was under construction they shut down several of the elevators and there were families and groups sitting on the floor everywhere
They seem to be very understaffed for all going on so much for a good nights sleep before such a big day for our family
The single most incompetent group of employees I have ever interacted with
Not a place for children or families

At the time of my stay there was a high school convention and you could n’t get breakfast or Starbucks the line where to long had to change rooms 3 time due to could n’t sleep with noise room kids run thru hotel screaming at all hours of the night the whole time I was there I would n’t be back I ’ve stayed at this location before about 4 time but this last time was enough for me and my family
It did not make up for ES almost ruining our trip
